\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{N^n} && {\varprojlim M_\lambda ^n} & {M_\lambda ^n} \\
	{N^{n+1}} && {\varprojlim M_\lambda ^{n+1}} \\
	&&& {M_\lambda ^{n+1}}
	\arrow["{\ell ^n}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["d", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{p_\lambda^n}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["d", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["d", from=1-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\ell ^{n+1}}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_\lambda ^{n+1}\circ \ell ^{n+1}}"'{pos=0.3}, curve={height=12pt}, from=2-1, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{p_\lambda^{n+1}}"{description}, dashed, from=2-3, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
